## Quaternion.getDirectionZ() method

Get the direction of axis z

**Signature:**

```typescript
getDirectionZ(result?: Vector3): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  result | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | _(Optional)_ The output vector, if not specified, a new vector will be created. |
